channel.title: Posts on Siddharth Jain
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Siddharth Jain

item.title: Fearing nature is a survival skill: A Lesson from Irshalgad
item.description: Man dies after 120 foot jump in Dabhosa waterfall 4 students drown near Sondai Fort, Experienced trekker dies in rapelling expedition in Ahmednagar At every single waterfall or trek that you have been on, there have been a few people as smart and confident as you that have overestimated themselves and underestimated nature. On a recent trek to Irshalgad, I came across a group of 12-15 people with 1 trek leader, they had camped the night and were going to the top of Irshalgad, which comes after a tricky section involving ropes and ladders.

item.title: Why are you building what you're building?
item.description: Every data professional has worked on a dashboard and wanted to cram all sorts of fancy charts/data points in it. Every data professional knows that no one is really going to use the dashboard properly. They’ll still want to make the dashboard as awesome (from their POV) as possible. Just so y'all know: Every time you push code, you appear on this real-time wall at the @github HQ. pic.twitter.com/rqfpDPDDjB

item.title: Garbett Plateau Trek
item.description: A relatively easy (but long) trek near Karjat, just 90 minutes from Mumbai and a great weekend getaway I highly recommend it, so would quite a few folks at CleverTap Route: Map above has many comments üó∫Ô∏è How To Reach: Train: Local train from Ghatkopar to Bhivpuri Road (CSMT‚ÜíKarjat Fast Train), takes ~90 minutes Car: Drive to Diksal village, park near Shiv Temple (marked on the map) and descend back to there post the trek.

item.title: Maximising Your A/B Test Outcomes with Multi Armed Bandits
item.description: Traditional A/B testing has stuck around for decades and is an important tool in a marketer‚Äôs toolkit, but there also exist other techniques for testing, some that even perform better and combat the flaws of A/B testing. Let‚Äôs explore them in this blog… Read the full blog

item.title: How to Analyse Marketing Surveys
item.description: How Do We Find Bivariate Insights From Survey Data? Create a pivot table/crosstab of the two variables you are considering. Calculate the Chi Square and p value to test for significance of the relationship between the variables. If significant, create heatmaps to find standout insights within the crosstab… Read the full blog

item.title: Data Integrity
item.description: In today‚Äôs era of personalized marketing, a marketer is lost without rich customer data. But what many marketers forget while pushing millions of data points to the cloud is the importance of quality and the integrity of their data points… Read the full blog
